verses.verse: For as much <S%G3767>then<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G3958>suffered<s%> for us in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3695>arm<s%> yourselves <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1771>mind:<s%> for he that has <S%G3958>suffered<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> has <S%G3973>ceased<s%> from <S%G266>sin;<s%>

That he <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> should <S%G980>live<s%> the <S%G1954>rest<s%> of his <S%G5550>time<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> to the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3928>past<s%> of our <S%G979>life<s%> may <S%G713>suffice<s%> us to have <S%G2716>worked<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> when we <S%G4198>walked<s%> in <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> <S%G3632>excess<s%> of <S%G3632>wine,<s%> <S%G2970>revelings,<s%> <S%G4224>parties,<s%> and <S%G111>abominable<s%> <S%G1495>idolatries:<s%>

<S%G1722>Wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> they think it <S%G3579>strange<s%> that you <S%G4936>run<s%> not with them to the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G401>excess<s%> of <S%G810>riot,<s%> <S%G987>speaking<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of you:
<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> to him that is <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>quick<s%> and the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For for <S%G5124>this<s%> cause was the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to them that are <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that they might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
But the <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things is <S%G1448>at<s%> <S%G1448>hand:<s%> be you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4993>sober,<s%> and <S%G3525>watch<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer.<s%>

And <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1618>fervent<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves:<s%> for <S%G26>charity<s%> shall <S%G2572>cover<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

As <S%G1538>every<s%> man has <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5486>gift,<s%> even so <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> to <S%G1438>another,<s%> as <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2980>speak,<s%> let him <S%G2980>speak<s%> as the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G1247>minister,<s%> let him do it as of the <S%G2479>ability<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5524>gives:<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>praise<s%> and <S%G2904>dominion<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> think it not <S%G3579>strange<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4451>fiery<s%> trial which is to <S%G4314>try<s%> <S%G3986><s%> you, as though some <S%G3581>strange<s%> thing <S%G4819>happened<s%> to you:

But <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G2526>inasmuch<s%> as you are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings;<s%> that, <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> shall be <S%G602>revealed,<s%> you may be <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with exceeding <S%G21>joy.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> you be <S%G3679>reproached<s%> for the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3107>happy<s%> are you; for the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> and of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G373>rests<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> you: on their part he is <S%G987>evil<s%> <S%G987>spoken<s%> of, but <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> part he is <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>

But let <S%G3361>none<s%> of you <S%G3958>suffer<s%> as a <S%G5406>murderer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as an <S%G2555>evildoer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> as a <S%G244>busybody<s%> in <S%G244>other<s%> men's matters.

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any man suffer as a <S%G5546>Christian,<s%> let him not be <S%G153>ashamed;<s%> but let him <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf.<s%>

For the <S%G2540>time<s%> is come that <S%G2917>judgment<s%> must <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G4412>first<s%> begin <S%G575>at<s%> us, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall the <S%G5056>end<s%> be of them that <S%G544>obey<s%> not the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>
And <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> shall the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> and the <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G5316>appear?<s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> let them that <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3908>commit<s%> the keeping of their <S%G5590>souls<s%> to him in <S%G16>well<s%> <S%G16>doing,<s%> as to a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2939>Creator.<s%>
